thread.section_title: Hotel de Bellevue Paris Gare du Nord - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Mum's 70th Birthday 3 day Trip
thread.title_full: Mum's 70th Birthday 3 day Trip - Review of Hotel de Bellevue Paris Gare du Nord, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lisa t
title: Mum's 70th Birthday 3 day Trip
text:
We absolutely loved this hotel. Spotlessly clean with comfy beds. The staff are just so lovely, multi lingual and cant help you enough. Breakfast was excellent with lots of choice. Yes, the area is not the best but the hotel and staff certainly make up for that. They really look after your every need. Literally a 3 min walk to the nearest Metro at La Chapelle, ideal for sightseeing.
We had the best time and would not hesitate in returning to this hotel.
